Preston's Posts (70985 & 70986=
)

Re: Wicked Blades in the Dark!!


Near to the Black Tower:

As Tuscon an=
d the rest lay down their weapons, the other soldiers move
to encircle the =
Maximals and the Autobots. Insecticon, Bruticus-X, and
Iguanus moved in alm=
ost eagerly to pick up the mighty weapons that
Tuscon has dropped, while In=
ferno, the self proclaimed bodyguard of
Hydras watched Tuscon carefully, hi=
s optic ready to spot treachery.

Quietly a short message is sent to Tuscon=
, =93Tuscon.=94 The deep voice of
Noctorro, the leader of the Maximal Fuzor=
s can be heard, =93My team is
here. Rodimus sent us to aid you. None too so=
on it would seem.=94
Noctorro=92s words are grim, a soldier=92s humor in th=
em. =93We await your
signal.=94

At the same time Injector, Buzzclaw, Terro=
rgator, and Quickstrike move
to do the same with Kup, Nightshift, Straights=
hot, Talon and the
others. Skyshadow, the leader of the Predacon Fuzors jus=
t watches with
a gloating look on his face, it is almost as if he wants the=
m to
attack and keep the battle going.

Meanwhile Phobia and several sweeps=
 keep an eye on things from the
air, while Terrorsaur and Waspinator landed=
, ready to help out as
needed.

At the same time Legacy processed Tuscon=92=
s command for him to leave
the Ark. There was a long pause, and then the te=
mporal guardian=92s cold
voice comes across the channel, =93I will not comp=
ly with your command.
I have been tasked with the . . . >*BZZZTT!*<

Deepst=
ryke transmits to Hydras, =93Hydras. I am picking up an encrypted
transmiss=
ions to and from Tuscon, he is attempting to communicate with
the others. I=
 am generating a radio dampening field now in this area.
Only the Predacons=
 will be able to transmit.=94


Meanwhile inside the Black Tower:

Windlord=
=92s attempt to open fire on the Scourge was met with a measure
of futility=
. Scourge just stepped away from the opening that Windlord
fired out from a=
nd let the shots go harmlessly into a bulkhead,
scorching it only slightly.=


However that slight amount of time allowed Windlord and Rat Trap time
to =
scurry further into their crawl space and find an interior bulkhead
to hide=
 behind.

=93Scrap!=94 Scourge=92s voice said from the outside. There was a=
 pause and
then, =93Cyclonus, they have fled into the walls.=94

There was =
another pause, and then Scourge chuckled, =93Of course. I will
be ready for=
 them.=94

From further inside the crawl space the sounds of chittering cou=
ld be
heard, and then several groups of optics could be seen in the distanc=
e
coming towards Rat Trap and Windlord. In the darkness their shapes
could =
only be barely made out, but they looked like black metallic
spiders, Hydra=
s=92 wall guardians!

(OOC: Rat Trap may recognize them from last time. Als=
o keep in mind
that Rat Trap and Windlord should be in beast mode. They wou=
ld have to
be to fit inside the crawl space. In the toon the Beast Modes di=
d not
have offensive weaponry, except for teeth and claws)

Outside the Ark=
:

Rodimus was positioned in a small grove of trees, ducking down behind
se=
veral large rocks. He gives Quickstride a quizzical look as the
equine Maxi=
mal sniffed him.

(OOC: Quickstride=92s sniff reveals nothing wrong.)

He w=
as about to let Quickstride in on what he had planned when Uproar
appeared.=
 Rodimus appears taken aback though by Uproar=92s conclusion
that it was Le=
gacy that had turned evil. While Rodimus didn=92t know
that much about Lega=
cy, having only seen him briefly while being
rescued and repaired, there wa=
s nothing to hint that this attack was
Legacy=92s doing. He was about to sa=
y something when Uproar ran towards
the Ark to be let in . . .

>KRACK POW<=


As Uproar ran towards the Ark, what seemed like a round bolt of
lightenin=
g appeared, sending Uproar flying several yards through the
air, to land he=
avily on the ground! Evidently the Ark shielding was
still in place, and it=
 was not allowing anyone in.

Rodimus frowned, =93Uproar! Get over here! If=
 we are going to get back
in, then we need to work together. That shield is=
 supposed to hold off
all the Predacon forces. We are not going to get in b=
y brute force.=94

As Rodimus talked three other Maximals seemed to almost =
materialize
out of the underbrush, such was their skills at camouflage.

Th=
e first was Wing Caliber, (See: http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Skywarp ) an
old Max=
imal stratagist and military teacher, who from the brownish
feathers along =
his frame turned into some sort of eagle.

The next was Leo II,
(http://en.=
academic.ru/pictures/enwiki/76/Lioconvoy_gathering.jpg )
the adopted son of=
 Lio Convoy, and who looked much like him, and who
had obviously picked up =
many of his mannerisms. His body was
powerfully built and heavily armored. =
He looked to turn into a lion.

The third was Ramulus (http://tfwiki.net/wi=
ki/Ramulus) who had like
the others been on patrol for a while, surveying t=
he area and trying
to keep it free from Predacon invasion.

They also come =
up beside Rodimus, Leo II, obviously the leader of the
other two, =93What n=
ow sir?=94

Rodimus looked at Quickstride and Uproar, =93Well let=92s get o=
ut of
sight, and then we can discuss it.=94

Meanwhile Inside the Ark:

Per=
ceptor had received Tuscon=92s message and sent attempted to send a
message=
 to Lord elder, however at the moment there was no answer from
the elder Ma=
ximal.

At the same time Legacy was still standing in the med lab along wit=
h
the others, his single optic glowing in the darkness.

=93It would seem t=
hat Nightlight=92s vital systems are being held at
minimal levels.=94 Legac=
y said as he directed his gaze to the wall panel
nearest Nightlight. A smal=
l light blinked, indicating her spark was
still online, but that there was =
not enough power to reboot her
systems.

He turned to look at the others, h=
is face glowing in the darkness, lit
by his own optic, and the glowing bar =
on his chest plate. He raised
his right hand in the air, the one with the a=
rm cannon on it and begin
to emit light from it, much like a flash light or=
 a beacon so that the
room was illuminated. He casually looked around, =93P=
erhaps we could
locate a back out or reserve power system . . . =93

Legacy=
 paused as Tuscon=92s message came in. He turned to look at
Santon, Bump an=
d Perceptor, a look of disbelief momentarily flashing
across his face.

Leg=
acy straightened as his cold voice comes across the channel, =93I
will not =
comply with your command. I have been tasked with  . . . .
>*BZZZTT!*<  . .=
 . the protection of the Ark as well as that of the
Matrix. I will not know=
ingly leave the Ark undefended or the Matrix in
the hands of another.=94

L=
egacy turned to look at his console as he understoodf what happened.
Commun=
ications had been cut part way through his message. He turned to
look at th=
e others, his single optic cold, =93It is illogical to believe
that I would=
 attempt to harm the Ark or allow anyone to take it from
the Maximals.=94

=
(TAG)

Preston

OOC: Please keep in mind that radio/video communications fr=
om the
battle field around the Black Tower have been severed for the Maxima=
ls
and Autobots. Those at the Ark however are free to communicate with
each=
 other if they choose.

Sandy's Message: (Message #70992)

Tucson now recie=
ves Notcorro's message. He thinks of a way to signal him
without drawing at=
tention to himself or the others. It was critical. He keeps
his weapons dow=
n, and sends an encrypted message back to Noctorro.

" You're right, I'm no=
t exactly perfect, and help would gladly be appreciated.
I have an idea. Wh=
ile I have you on an encrypted signal, I best let you know to
start moving =
in now. But try to remain unseen, move in gradually, and quietly.
If you ca=
n, send in several fuzors in at a time, and in phases, send in others,
acco=
rding to their skills and expertise. I will continue to hold my position
he=
re."

Night Shift and Straight Shot keep quiet. They could tell Tucson was =
in thought,
and somehow thinking up a strategy to get them out of their bin=
d. He now had to
send a message to Legacy.

"Legacy, if you can hear me, I =
strongly suggest that you heed my demands and
vacate immediately. You are e=
ndangering the lives of Nightlight and the others,
and those who endanger m=
y comrades, deserve not to be among them. Although, I
will be willing to me=
et with you privately in a remote location of your choice.
But not now. Now=
 is not the time. Heed my words now and things will not be
difficult."

Bac=
k at the Ark, Uproar hears Rodimus, and trots over to him, looking a bit
co=
nfused. Quickstride looks over to him as well.

" Sorry for the fuss, hey, =
what's go'n on? Why won't the Ark open for us?"

Quickstride looks over to =
him.

"Legacy is holding the Ark hostage, I think, or at least that's what =
I got from
the last message from Lord Elder."

Uproar looks to the Ark and =
back at Rodimus.

"Whew, I'm glad you stopped me, Sir. No tell'n what kind =
of attack I could've
met up with. Okay, I'm definitely in on helping you ou=
t. But how are we gonna
get the Ark back without getting blown ta scrap?"

=
Quickstride looks to Rodimus.

"Yeah, what he said, how are we gonna get ou=
ta this mess? This is something
neither one of us has ever encountered."
